response.original_title: In Performance At The White House - Memphis Soul
response.overview: “In Performance at the White House: Memphis Soul” is a PBS music special taped in the East Room of the White House, celebrating the timeless classics of Memphis Soul.  President and Mrs. Obama will host the event. The all-star concert will include performances by Alabama Shakes, William Bell, Eddie Floyd, Steve Cropper, Ben Harper, Queen Latifah, Cyndi Lauper, Joshua Ledet, Sam Moore, Charlie Musselwhite, Mavis Staples and Justin Timberlake, with Booker T. Jones as music director and band leader.
response.title: In Performance At The White House - Memphis Soul
